attributes.action: Close schools, colleges & universities immediately to prevent Covid-19.
attributes.additional_details: The government should implement WHO advice by closing schools, providing widespread testing for coronavirus, limiting social/mass gatherings and enforcing travel bans. The UK is no different to any other country and the majority of other countries worldwide that have been affected by coronavirus have implemented all of the above. Italy did not act quickly enough and are now overwhelmed. The government needs to act NOW.
attributes.background: The government are putting lives in danger by keeping schools open and giving vague advice regarding coronavirus.
